a: Fish Mouth isn’t a list—it’s a **system**. Leads come with proof (imagery + overlays), verified contacts, and built‑in follow‑ups that trigger when a homeowner views your report.
We enforce domain/SMS best practices (SPF/DKIM/DMARC, A2P) and track deliverability end‑to‑end. Stop/Help opt‑outs are automatic.

q: We’re busy—no time to learn another tool.
a: Two clicks from the homepage to action. Sequences and reminders run themselves. You’ll spend time **installing**, not configuring.
Yes—our reports support adjuster conversations and supplements. Use our templates for claim timelines and photo evidence.
